mapper.select: select * from qna_table order by qna_idx desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into qna_table(user_idx, user_type, user_id, qna_subject, qna_content, qna_created_date, qna_pw) values(#{user_idx}, #{user_type}, #{user_id}, #{qna_subject}, #{qna_content}, sysdate(), #{qna_pw})
insert into qna_reply_table(qna_reply_writer, qna_reply_content, qna_reply_date, qna_idx) values(#{qna_reply_writer}, #{qna_reply_content}, sysdate(), #{qna_idx})
mapper.update: update qna_table set qna_reply_status = 1 where qna_idx = #{qna_idx}
